summary: Simply adds all the hair styles to every race and sex.
descriptionHtml:
Simply adds all the hair styles to every race and sex.

NOTE: I know that some hairstyles clip and some don\'t appear, that\'s because most of the hair models were made specifically for certain races and sexes. I cannot fix this, unless I were learn how to modify the model files, and that\'s advanced for me.

To install, simiply put the .esp file into the C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data folder, and run Skyrim, activating the mod through whatever your mod manager is.

Or, you could use the very simple Nexus Mod Manager link, it\'s your choice.

If you are going to post pictures, please keep it Safe For Work.


Bug List:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1. Some hairs and beards repeat (KNOWN, CANNOT FIX)

2. Some hairs and beards clip     (KNOWN, CANNOT FIX)
author: ClarkWasHere
